name: R'lyeh
tagline: R'lyeh - In which the Great Old Ones spawn infinite little eldritch monsters at you until you kill them.
body:
# R'lyeh
## a game by Segmentation Fault Technologies ##


### Installation
To play the game, you'll need to install [https://python.org/download](Python) as well as [https://python-sfml.org/download.html](PySFML). Then, just hit [https://github.com/inhumanundead/rlyeh/archive/master.zip](this link) to download R'lyeh. Just click on rlyeh.py to play

### System Requirements
This game doesn't require much, just have a CPU that's better than a Pentium 2 and any of the modern operating systems (Windows 2000 through 8, Mac OS X, and most forms of Linux).

### Credits
This game was developed by Segmentation Fault Technologies. Team SegFault consists of Draven Stedman (programmer extraordinaire) and Josh Feala (the dude with the pen and paintbrush)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
